org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io

类 ByteBufferPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ByteBufferPool

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ByteBufferPool
extends Object
    Like Hadoops' ByteBufferPool only you do not specify desired size when getting a ByteBuffer. This pool keeps an upper bound on the count of ByteBuffers in the pool and a fixed size of ByteBuffer that it will create. When requested, if a free ByteBuffer is already present, it will return that. And when no free ByteBuffer available and we are below the max count, it will create a new one and return that.

    Note: This pool returns off heap ByteBuffers by default. If on heap ByteBuffers to be pooled, pass 'directByteBuffer' as false while construction of the pool.

    This class is thread safe.

    另请参阅:
    ByteBufferListOutputStream

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ByteBufferPool

        public ByteBufferPool(int bufferSize,
                      int maxPoolSize)
        参数:
        bufferSize - Size of each buffer created by this pool.
        maxPoolSize - Max number of buffers to keep in this pool.

      • ByteBufferPool

        public ByteBufferPool(int bufferSize,
                      int maxPoolSize,
                      boolean directByteBuffer)
        参数:
        bufferSize - Size of each buffer created by this pool.
        maxPoolSize - Max number of buffers to keep in this pool.
        directByteBuffer - Whether to create direct ByteBuffer or on heap ByteBuffer.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getBuffer

        public ByteBuffer getBuffer()
        返回:
        One free ByteBuffer from the pool. If no free ByteBuffer and we have not reached the maximum pool size, it will create a new one and return. In case of max pool size also reached, will return null. When pool returned a ByteBuffer, make sure to return it back to pool after use.
        另请参阅:
        putbackBuffer(ByteBuffer)

      • putbackBuffer

        public void putbackBuffer(ByteBuffer buf)
        Return back a ByteBuffer after its use. Do not try to return put back a ByteBuffer, not obtained from this pool.
        参数:
        buf - ByteBuffer to return.

      • getBufferSize

        public int getBufferSize()

      • getQueueSize

        public int getQueueSize()
        返回:
        Number of free buffers
